battledia.title: Battledia
battledia.description: Battledia Quests are unique quests that can be accessed through a Trigger Portal

cocoon.title: Cocoon
cocoon.description: Cocoons are smaller challenges designed to test players

mag.title: Regional Mag
mag.description: By giving gathering materials to a Region Mag, you can improve the boosts that Region Mag gives to players in the current region, as well as level up your own personal boosts

ryuker.title: Ryuker Device
ryuker.description: Ryuker Devices can be used for several purposes, including changing Blocks, accessing your Storage remotely, creating Quick Food, moving to different Rooms, and quick travel

tower.title: Tower
tower.description: Towers are larger challenges, more complex quests similar to "Time Attack" quests from PSO2

urgent.title: Emergency Quest
urgent.description: Urgent Quests are special Quests that can occur several times a day and can only be accepted during the time period it occurs

dualomite.title: Dualomite
dualomite.description: Used for unlocking Potentials Lv2 and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

monotite.title: Monotite
monotite.description: Used for unlocking Potentials Lv1 and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

photonchunk.title: Photon Chunk
photonchunk.description: Used for Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

photonquartz.title: Photon Quartz
photonquartz.description: Used for Multi-weaponization at the Item Lab

photonscale.title: Photon Scale
photonscale.description: Used as material at the Item Lab.

tetracite.title: Tetracite
tetracite.description: Used to unlock Potentials at the Item Lab.

trinite.title: Trinite
trinite.description: Used for unlocking Potentials Lv3 and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab

prefix.special:
Appears only with a certain conditions 
Can be exchanged for various rewards

red.title: Item Container [Red]
red.description: Contains very valuable items like Meseta, Star Gems, Units, etc.. Each container can only be broken once per account.

alphareactor.title: Alpha Reactor
alphareactor.description:
Can be converted to 3500 N-Meseta. 
14 Alpha Reactors will spawn in various locations in the Central Aelio every day.

snoal.title: Snowks
snoal.description:
Can be converted to 3000 N-Meseta. 
10 Snowks will spawn in Central Kvaris every day.

datapod.title: Datapod
datapod.description: Message Packs contain messages from the residents of Halpha. Some also contain items.

stellarseed.title: Stellar Seed
stellarseed.description:
Can be converted to 2000 N-Meseta. 
10 Stellar Fragments will spawn in West Retem every day.

veteran.title: Veteran
veteran.description: "Battle-Hardened" enemies that spawn at fixed locations in Exploration Sections. Also known as "Dread" enemies or "Veterans".

stellargrace.title: Stellar Grace
stellargrace.description: Stellar Graces are part of the "Stellar Grace Recovery Operation" World Trial. The objective of the World Trial is to gather all the pyramidal containers known as Stellar Graces hidden in each Exploration Section.

musicplace.title: BGM Easter Egg
musicplace.description: Places that play music from older games of the Phantasy Star franchise.
musicplace.hint: Press the left mouse button on marker to copy the music title

mischief.title: Mischief Symbol
mischief.description: During the season's event on Halpha, you can find these holographic symbols.
